function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid clearing out ('whoosh' effect) of tracer gas after window opening","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases if air exchange is not effectively managed","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation strategies such as controlled ventilation and air filtration to manage air exchange effectively","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, HEPA filters, and air purifiers","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building managers, architects, and HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Multiple window opening experiments showing increased air change rates","Impact":"Higher air change rates may lead to rapid spread of airborne pathogens if not managed effectively","Mitigation":"Implementing zoning systems and air quality monitoring to ensure balanced ventilation and prevent excessive air change rates","Technologies":"Zoned HVAC systems, IoT air quality sensors, and demand-controlled ventilation","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building managers and HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Tracer gas concentrations decayed to below detection limits within a short time after window opening","Impact":"Inability to accurately measure and manage air exchange rates, posing a risk of insufficient ventilation","Mitigation":"Implementing real-time air quality monitoring and periodic system recalibration to ensure accurate measurement of air exchange rates","Technologies":"Real-time air quality sensors and automated ventilation control systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building managers and HVAC engineers"}]}
